downloadDescription: Get PDFs and Visio files of the flowcharts and an Excel worksheet of the checklists for the incident response playbooks.
detailsSection: Incident response playbooks from Microsoft (https://aka.ms/irplaybooks) provide detailed guidance for common attack methods that malicious users employ every day against organizations like yours. These additional resources provide easy to scan, print, and customize versions of the workflows for each playbook and an Excel workbook with the playbook checklist. Use these resources to help your security operations team ramp up and more quickly resolve attacks
systemRequirementsSection:
Adobe PDF Reader
Visio of the Visio Viewer
Excel of the Excel Viewer
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.
